text:
I was walking around inside the training
camp facility, checking the layout and facilities.

I wanted to get it done
before the lessons started, but...

Figuring out the locations of the laundry room,
kitchen, and everything seemed like a good idea.

I see. Thank you.
But Chiyuki, you didn't have to go that farâ€”

But if someone gets lost... I want everyone to
focus on the lessons during this training camp.

If that's the case, even more so.
It's my job to ensure everyone can comfortably stay here.

I'll take care of the rest, so Chiyuki,
please don't push yourself and take a break.
